mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note ( CONTENT, KEYWORD, POSTTIME, AID, TITLE, CLZSS, LABEL, ) VALUES ( #{content}, #{keyword}, now(), #{aid}, #{title}, #{clzss}, #{label}, )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, CONTENT, KEYWORD, TITLE, LABEL, REMARKS FROM note WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE note SET TITLE = #{title}, KEYWORD = #{keyword}, LABEL = #{label}, CONTENT = #{content}, POSTTIME = NOW(), REMARKS = #{remarks} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM note WHERE CLZSS = #{clzss}
